summary.span: 在執行階段定義和建立類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Defines and creates new instances of classes during run time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根類別用來控制在執行階段動態類別的建立。 is the root class used to control the creation of dynamic classes in the runtime. 它提供一組用來定義類別、 方法和欄位，加上建立的類別模組內的常式。It provides a set of routines that are used to define classes, add methods and fields, and create the class inside a module. 新可以建立從動態模組，藉由呼叫方法，以傳回物件。A new can be created from a dynamic module by calling the method, which returns a object. 反映發出提供下列選項，可定義類型：Reflection emit provides the following options for defining types: - 定義類別或介面，以指定的名稱。Define a class or interface with the given name. - 定義類別或介面的指定名稱和屬性。Define a class or interface with the given name and attributes. - 定義具有指定名稱、 屬性和基底類別的類別。Define a class with the given name, attributes, and base class. - 定義具有指定名稱、 屬性、 基底類別和類別實作的介面的集合的類別。Define a class with the given name, attributes, base class, and the set of interfaces that the class implements. - 定義具有指定名稱、 屬性、 基底類別和封裝大小的類別。Define a class with the given name, attributes, base class, and packing size. - 為整體來定義具有指定名稱、 屬性、 基底類別和類別大小的類別。Define a class with the given name, attributes, base class, and the class size as a whole. - 為整體來定義具有指定名稱、 屬性、 基底類別、 封裝大小和類別大小的類別。Define a class with the given name, attributes, base class, packing size, and the class size as a whole. 若要建立的陣列類型、 指標類型或不完整的型別所表示的 byref 類型物件，請使用方法，方法，或方法，分別。To create an array type, pointer type, or byref type for an incomplete type that is represented by a object, use the method, method, or method, respectively. 在使用型別之前，必須呼叫方法。Before a type is used, the method must be called. **CreateType**完成的型別建立。**CreateType** completes the creation of the type. 下列呼叫**CreateType**，呼叫端可以使用具現化型別方法，並使用叫用型別的成員方法。Following the call to **CreateType**, the caller can instantiate the type by using the method, and invoke members of the type by using the method. 它是叫用變更後的類型實作的方法時發生**CreateType**已呼叫。It is an error to invoke methods that change the implementation of a type after **CreateType** has been called. 如果呼叫端嘗試將新成員加入至類型中，比方說，common language runtime 會擲回例外狀況。For example, the common language runtime throws an exception if the caller tries to add new members to a type. 類別初始設定式由使用方法。A class initializer is created by using the method. **DefineTypeInitializer**傳回物件。**DefineTypeInitializer** returns a object. 巢狀型別由呼叫其中一個定義方法。Nested types are defined by calling one of the methods. ## 屬性Attributes 類別會使用列舉，來進一步指定要建立類型的特性：The class uses the enumeration to further specify the characteristics of the type to be created: - 使用指定的介面和屬性。Interfaces are specified using the and attributes. - 使用指定實體類別 （無法擴充的類別）屬性。Concrete classes (classes that cannot be extended) are specified using the attribute. - 數個屬性會決定型別可視性。Several attributes determine type visibility. 請參閱描述列舉型別。See the description of the enumeration. - 如果指定，則類別載入器配置它們從中繼資料的讀取的順序中的欄位。If is specified, the class loader lays out fields in the order they are read from metadata. 類別載入器會考慮指定的封裝大小，但會忽略任何指定的欄位位移。The class loader considers the specified packing size but ignores any specified field offsets. 中繼資料會保留在其中的欄位定義會發出的順序。The metadata preserves the order in which the field definitions are emitted. 即使是跨合併，中繼資料不會重新排列欄位定義。Even across a merge, the metadata will not reorder the field definitions. 載入器將會採用指定的欄位位移才指定。The loader will honor the specified field offsets only if is specified. ## 已知問題Known Issues - 反映發出不會驗證是否實作介面的非抽象類別已實作介面中所宣告的所有方法。Reflection emit does not verify whether a non-abstract class that implements an interface has implemented all the methods declared in the interface. 不過，如果類別未實作介面中宣告的所有方法，執行階段未載入的類別。However, if the class does not implement all the methods declared in an interface, the runtime does not load the class. - 雖然衍生自中, 定義的抽象方法的一些類別中不會完全實作類別。Although is derived from , some of the abstract methods defined in the class are not fully implemented in the class. 呼叫這些方法會擲回例外狀況。Calls to these methods throw a exception. 您可以取得所需的功能建立的類型使用擷取或並反映所擷取類型。The desired functionality can be obtained by retrieving the created type using the or and reflecting on the retrieved type. ## Examples 本節包含兩個程式碼範例。This section contains two code examples. 第一個範例示範如何建立動態型別欄位中，建構函式、 屬性和方法。The first example shows how to create a dynamic type with a field, constructor, property, and method. 第二個範例為基礎的方法，以動態方式從使用者輸入。The second example builds a method dynamically from user input. **其中一個範例****Example one** 下列程式碼範例示範如何定義具有一個模組的動態組件。The following code example shows how to define a dynamic assembly with one module. 範例組件中的模組包含一種類型， `MyDynamicType`，其具有私用欄位、 取得和設定私用欄位的屬性、 建構函式會初始化私用欄位及將使用者提供的點數的私用欄位的方法值，並傳回結果。The module in the example assembly contains one type, `MyDynamicType`, which has a private field, a property that gets and sets the private field, constructors that initialize the private field, and a method that multiplies a user-supplied number by the private field value and returns the result. 欄位會指定在建立組件。The field is specified when the assembly is created. 立即使用的組件程式碼及組件也會儲存至磁碟，以便它可以與檢查[Ildasm.exe （IL 反組譯工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)或用於另一個程式。The assembly code is used immediately, and the assembly is also saved to disk so that it can be examined with [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md) or used in another program. [!code-cpp[AssemblyBuilderClass#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyBuilderClass/cpp/24895.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AssemblyBuilderClass#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyBuilderClass/cs/24895.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AssemblyBuilderClass#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyBuilderClass/vb/24895.vb#1)] **範例二****Example two** 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用建置動態的型別`TypeBuilder`。The following code sample demonstrates how to build a dynamic type by using `TypeBuilder`. [!code-cpp[System.Reflection.Emit ILGenerator Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Emit ILGenerator Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Reflection.Emit ILGenerator Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Emit ILGenerator Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Reflection.Emit ILGenerator Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Emit ILGenerator Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 加入此類型的宣告式安全性。

span.span: Adds declarative security to this type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `AddDeclarativeSecurity` 可呼叫多次指定安全性動作 （例如要求、 判斷提示或拒絕） 和一組套用至動作的權限的每次呼叫。`AddDeclarativeSecurity` may be called several times with each call specifying a security action (such as Demand, Assert, or Deny) and a set of permissions that apply to the action. > [!NOTE] > 在.NET framework 1.0、 1.1 和 2.0 版中，使用此方法套用至類型的宣告式安全性屬性會儲存在舊的 XML 中繼資料格式。In the .NET Framework versions 1.0, 1.1, and 2.0, the declarative security attributes applied to a type by using this method are stored in the old XML metadata format. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用`AddDeclarativeSecurity`方法來加入安全性要求具有旗標，以動態類型，名為`MyDynamicClass`，名為 EmittedExample.dll 組件中。The following example demonstrates the use of the `AddDeclarativeSecurity` method to add a security demand for with the flag to a dynamic type named `MyDynamicClass`, in an assembly named EmittedExample.dll. 此範例會產生任何主控台輸出;您在執行之後，您可以使用[Ildasm.exe （IL 反組譯工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)檢查 EmittedExample.dll。The example produces no console output; after you run it, you can use [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md) to examine EmittedExample.dll. 在 `MyDynamicClass`，開啟`.class public auto ansi`宣告式的權限的陳述式。In `MyDynamicClass`, open the `.class public auto ansi` statement to see the declarative permission. [!code-cpp[TypeBuilder_AddDeclarativeSecurity#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/TypeBuilder_AddDeclarativeSecurity/CPP/typebuilder_adddeclarativesecurity.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[TypeBuilder_AddDeclarativeSecurity#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/TypeBuilder_AddDeclarativeSecurity/CS/typebuilder_adddeclarativesecurity.cs#1)] [!code-vb[TypeBuilder_AddDeclarativeSecurity#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/TypeBuilder_AddDeclarativeSecurity/VB/typebuilder_adddeclarativesecurity.vb#1)]

summary.span: 建立這個類別的 物件。

span.span: Creates a object for the class.

summary.span: 定義類別上的欄位和方法之後，呼叫 以載入其 物件。

span.span: After defining fields and methods on the class, is called in order to load its object.

returns.span: 傳回這個類別的新 物件。

span.span: Returns the new object for this class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此類型是巢狀的類型，巢狀型別上被呼叫之前，必須在封入類型上呼叫方法。If this type is a nested type, the method must be called on the enclosing type before it is called on the nested type. 如果目前的型別衍生自不完整的類型，或實作不完整的介面，呼叫父型別和介面類型，然後再呼叫目前的類型上的方法。If the current type derives from an incomplete type or implements incomplete interfaces, call the method on the parent type and the interface types before calling it on the current type. 如果封入類型包含的欄位，是定義為巢狀類型 （例如，欄位是列舉型別定義為巢狀型別），實值型別呼叫封入型別上的方法會產生事件。If the enclosing type contains a field that is a value type defined as a nested type (for example, a field that is an enumeration defined as a nested type), calling the method on the enclosing type will generate a event. 這是因為載入器無法判斷封入類型的大小，直到完成為止的巢狀的類型。This is because the loader cannot determine the size of the enclosing type until the nested type has been completed. 呼叫端應該定義的處理常式藉由呼叫完成的巢狀型別定義的事件上物件，表示巢狀型別。The caller should define a handler for the event to complete the definition of the nested type by calling on the object that represents the nested type. 本主題的程式碼範例示範如何定義這類事件處理常式。The code example for this topic shows how to define such an event handler. 型別只建立一次，不論多次呼叫方法。A type is created only once, no matter how many times the method is called. 所有的呼叫會傳回相同物件。All calls return the same object. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何定義的事件處理常式事件，才能呼叫期間的巢狀型別上的方法封入類型上呼叫。The following code example shows how to define an event handler for the event, in order to call the method on a nested type during a call on the enclosing type. [!code-cpp[System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.CreateType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.CreateType Example/CPP/nestedenum.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.CreateType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.CreateType Example/CS/nestedenum.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.CreateType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.CreateType Example/VB/nestedenum.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您沒有定義建構函式適用於您的動態類型，自動提供預設建構函式，而且它會呼叫基底類別的預設建構函式。If you do not define a constructor for your dynamic type, a default constructor is provided automatically, and it calls the default constructor of the base class. 如果您針對您動態型別定義建構函式，未提供預設建構函式。If you define a constructor for your dynamic type, a default constructor is not provided. 您有下列選項來提供預設建構函式，除了您定義的建構函式：You have the following options for providing a default constructor in addition to the constructor you defined: - 如果您想只會呼叫基底類別的預設建構函式的預設建構函式時，您可以使用方法來建立一個 （並選擇性地限制存取）。If you want a default constructor that simply calls the default constructor of the base class, you can use the method to create one (and optionally restrict access to it). 不提供此預設建構函式的實作。Do not provide an implementation for this default constructor. 如果您這樣做，當您嘗試使用建構函式時，會擲回例外狀況。If you do, an exception is thrown when you try to use the constructor. 沒有例外狀況時擲回呼叫方法。No exception is thrown when the method is called. - 如果您想要的預設建構函式，不會發生多個呼叫預設建構函式的基底類別，或呼叫的另一個建構函式的基底類別，或執行其他動作完全，您必須使用方法用來建立一個，並提供您自己的實作。If you want a default constructor that does something more than simply calling the default constructor of the base class, or that calls another constructor of the base class, or that does something else entirely, you must use the method to create one, and provide your own implementation. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用`DefineConstructor`來設定動態型別建構函式的特定的簽章和屬性，並傳回對應MSIL 母體擴展。The following code sample demonstrates the use of `DefineConstructor` to set a constructor's particular signature and attributes on a dynamic type and return a corresponding for MSIL population. remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您不知道在您將方法定義方法簽章時，請使用這個方法多載。Use this method overload when you do not know the method signature at the time you define the method. 例如，參數型別和泛型方法的傳回型別可能指定之方法的泛型型別參數，必須在之後的方法已加入至類型定義。For example, the parameter types and return type of a generic method might be specified by the method's generic type parameters, which must be defined after the method has been added to the type. 參數之方法的傳回型別可以設定和更新版本使用方法。The parameters and return type of the method can be set later using the method. 這個方法多載定義的方法與。This method overload defines a method with . 如果您需要定義的方法，而不需要簽章，請使用不同的呼叫慣例時，使用方法多載。If you need to define a method without a signature, with a different calling convention, use the method overload. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會定義泛型方法，名為`DemoMethod`其泛型型別參數所指定的參數類型和傳回型別。The following code example defines a generic method named `DemoMethod` whose parameter type and return type are specified by its generic type parameters. 這個方法被定義沒有簽章，使用標準呼叫慣例。The method is defined without a signature, using the standard calling convention. 方法用來讓`DemoMethod`泛型方法和新定義的類型參數則用於簽章和傳回型別。The method is used to make `DemoMethod` a generic method, and the newly defined type parameters are then used for the signature and return type. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分方法。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您需要指定自訂修飾詞，請使用此多載。Use this overload if you need to specify custom modifiers. 如果您需要指定自訂修飾詞之後建立的方法，像您一樣，例如，具有泛型方法的參數類型由其泛型型別參數，您可以使用或方法多載，來定義方法，然後使用方法來定義參數並傳回類型的自訂修飾詞。If you need to specify custom modifiers after the method has been created, as you would, for example, with a generic method whose parameter types are specified by its generic type parameters, you can use the or method overloads to define the method and then use the method to define the parameter and return types with custom modifiers. > [!NOTE] > 如需有關自訂修飾詞的詳細資訊，請參閱 ECMA 分割 II 中繼資料文件。For more information on custom modifiers, see the ECMA Partition II Metadata documentation. 您可以線上取得這份文件；請參閱 MSDN 上的 [ECMA C# 和通用語言基礎結構標準](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212)，以及 Ecma International 網站上的[標準 ECMA-335 - 通用語言基礎結構 (CLI)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552)。The documentation is available online; see [ECMA C# and Common Language Infrastructure Standards](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212) on MSDN and [Standard ECMA-335 - Common Language Infrastructure (CLI)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) on the Ecma International Web site.

summary.span: 指定實作給定方法宣告的給定方法主體，可能會使用其他名稱。

span.span: Specifies a given method body that implements a given method declaration, potentially with a different name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 請勿使用此方法以發出方法覆寫或介面實作。Do not use this method to emit method overrides or interface implementations. 若要覆寫基底類別的方法或實作介面的方法，只是發出具有相同的名稱和簽章的方法為方法，以覆寫或實作，在程式碼範例所示。To override a method of a base class or to implement a method of an interface, simply emit a method with the same name and signature as the method to be overridden or implemented, as demonstrated in the code example. 方法可在方法主體和方法宣告有不同的名稱。The method is used when a method body and a method declaration have different names. 例如，類別可能會覆寫基底類別方法，而也提供的個別實作介面成員相同的名稱，程式碼範例所示。For example, a class might override a base class method and also provide a separate implementation for an interface member with the same name, as demonstrated in the code example. `DefineMethodOverride` 定義`methodimpl`，其中包含一組中繼資料語彙基元。`DefineMethodOverride` defines a `methodimpl`, which consists of a pair of metadata tokens. 實作，而其他語彙基元指向主體所實作的宣告會指向一個權杖。One token points to an implementation, and the other token points to a declaration that the body implements. 必須定義方法實作為類型上定義主體和主體必須是虛擬 (`Overridable` Visual Basic 中)。The body must be defined on the type the method impl is defined on, and the body must be virtual (`Overridable` in Visual Basic). 宣告可以對型別、 對衍生的類別、 方法或類型中定義的方法所實作的介面上所定義的方法。The declaration can be made to a method defined on an interface implemented by the type, a method on a derived class, or a method defined in the type. 如果宣告是僅限介面上，這被改變介面所定義的位置。If the declaration is on an interface only, the slot defined for the interface is altered. 如果宣告對基底類型上的方法，會覆寫方法的位置，並覆寫方法的任何重複項目也會被取代。If the declaration is made to a method on a base type, the slot for the method is overridden and any duplicates for the overridden method are also replaced. 覆寫的方法不可以宣告的實際方法。The overridden method cannot be the actual method that is declared. 如果方法是在相同的型別上，位置會被取代，並且覆寫任何重複項目已取代的方法。If the method is on the same type, the slot is replaced and any duplicates for the replaced methods are overridden. > [!NOTE] > 如需有關方法 impl 的詳細資訊，請參閱`MethodImpl`ECMA 分割 II 中繼資料文件中。For more information about method impls, see `MethodImpl` in the ECMA Partition II Metadata documentation. 您可以線上取得這份文件；請參閱 MSDN 上的 [ECMA C# 和通用語言基礎結構標準](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212)，以及 Ecma International 網站上的[標準 ECMA-335 - 通用語言基礎結構 (CLI)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552)。The documentation is available online; see [ECMA C# and Common Language Infrastructure Standards](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212) on MSDN and [Standard ECMA-335 - Common Language Infrastructure (CLI)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) on the Ecma International Web site. > [!IMPORTANT] > 在後呼叫方法時，某些功能`methodInfoBody`無法變更。After the method is called, some features of `methodInfoBody` cannot be changed. 比方說，您無法在這裡將屬性套用至泛型類型參數的`methodInfoBody`使用方法。For example, you cannot apply an attribute to a generic type parameter of `methodInfoBody` by using the method. 如果您必須使用方法中，執行這項操作之後的所有特性`methodInfoBody`已定義。If you must use the method, do so after all characteristics of `methodInfoBody` have been defined. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例包含的介面`I`的方法`M()`，基底類別`A`實作的介面，並在衍生的類別`C`會覆寫的基底類別實作`M()`以及提供個別的明確實作的`I.M()`。The following code example contains an interface `I` with a method `M()`, a base class `A` that implements the interface, and a derived class `C` that overrides the base class implementation of `M()` and also provides a separate explicit implementation of `I.M()`. `main()`方法的程式碼範例示範如何發出衍生的類別`C`。The `main()` method of the code example shows how to emit the derived class `C`. 覆寫`A.M()`只要發出的方法完成`M()`具有相同的簽章。The override of `A.M()` is accomplished simply by emitting a method `M()` with the same signature. 不過，若要提供的不同實作`I.M()`，您必須定義方法主體，然後使用方法來建立使用該方法主體的關聯代表`I.M()`。However, to provide a separate implementation of `I.M()`, you must define a method body and then use the method to associate that method body with a representing `I.M()`. 方法主體的名稱不重要。The name of the method body does not matter. 在程式碼範例會建立發出類別的執行個體。The code example creates an instance of the emitted class. 它會取得物件`I.M()`，並使用它來叫用發出之的類別的明確介面實作。It obtains a object for `I.M()`, and uses it to invoke the emitted class's explicit interface implementation. 它接著會取得物件`A.M()`，並用它來叫用該方法發出的類別覆寫。It then obtains a object for `A.M()`, and uses it to invoke the emitted class's override of that method. [!code-cpp[TypeBuilder.DefineMethodOverride#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/TypeBuilder.DefineMethodOverride/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[TypeBuilder.DefineMethodOverride#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/TypeBuilder.DefineMethodOverride/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[TypeBuilder.DefineMethodOverride#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/TypeBuilder.DefineMethodOverride/vb/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 某些 DLL 匯入屬性 (請參閱描述) 不能指定為此方法的引數。Some DLL import attributes (see the description of ) cannot be specified as arguments to this method. 例如，DLL 匯入屬性必須在之後加入`PInvoke`建立方法時，如果這個方法傳回的值。For example, the DLL import attribute must be added after the `PInvoke` method is created, if the method returns a value. 此範例示範如何執行這項操作。The example shows how to do this. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用方法用來建立`PInvoke`方法，以及如何新增旗標，以在建立之後的方法實作旗標，使用並方法。The following example demonstrates how to use the method to create a `PInvoke` method, and how to add the flag to the method implementation flags after you create the , by using the and methods. > [!IMPORTANT] > 若要取得非零傳回值，您必須新增旗標。To get a non-zero return value, you must add the flag. 此範例會建立單一的型別，與一個動態模組的動態組件`MyType`，其中包含`PInvoke`方法。The example creates a dynamic assembly with one dynamic module and a single type, `MyType`, that contains the `PInvoke` method. `PInvoke`方法代表 Win32`GetTickCount`函式。The `PInvoke` method represents the Win32 `GetTickCount` function. 執行範例時，它會執行`PInvoke`方法。When the example is run, it executes the `PInvoke` method. 它也會儲存為 PInvokeTest.dll 的動態組件。It also saves the dynamic assembly as PInvokeTest.dll. 您可以使用[Ildasm.exe （IL 反組譯工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)來檢查`MyType`類別和`static`(`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中)`PInvoke`它所包含的方法。You can use the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md) to examine the `MyType` class and the `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) `PInvoke` method it contains. 您可以編譯 Visual Basic 或 C# 的程式，使用靜態`MyType.GetTickCount`包含 DLL 的參考，當您執行 csc.exe 或 vbc.exe; 方法，例如`/r:PInvokeTest.dll`。You can compile a Visual Basic or C# program that uses the static `MyType.GetTickCount` method by including a reference to the DLL when you run csc.exe or vbc.exe; for example, `/r:PInvokeTest.dll`. [!code-cpp[TypeBuilder_DefinePInvokeMethod_Fix#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/TypeBuilder_DefinePInvokeMethod_Fix/cpp/100656_fix.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[TypeBuilder_DefinePInvokeMethod_Fix#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/TypeBuilder_DefinePInvokeMethod_Fix/CS/100656_fix.cs#1)] [!code-vb[TypeBuilder_DefinePInvokeMethod_Fix#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/TypeBuilder_DefinePInvokeMethod_Fix/VB/100656_fix.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 某些 DLL 匯入屬性 (請參閱描述) 不能指定為此方法的引數。Some DLL import attributes (see the description of ) cannot be specified as arguments to this method. 例如，DLL 匯入屬性必須在之後加入`PInvoke`建立方法時，如果這個方法傳回的值。For example, the DLL import attribute must be added after the `PInvoke` method is created, if the method returns a value. 此範例示範如何執行這項操作。The example shows how to do this. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法用來建立`PInvoke`方法，以及如何新增旗標，以在建立之後的方法實作旗標，使用並方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to create a `PInvoke` method, and how to add the flag to the method implementation flags after you create the , by using the and methods. > [!IMPORTANT] > 若要取得非零傳回值，您必須新增旗標。To get a non-zero return value, you must add the flag. 此範例會建立單一的型別，與一個動態模組的動態組件`MyType`，其中包含`PInvoke`方法。The example creates a dynamic assembly with one dynamic module and a single type, `MyType`, that contains the `PInvoke` method. `PInvoke`方法代表 Win32`GetTickCount`函式。The `PInvoke` method represents the Win32 `GetTickCount` function. 執行範例時，它會執行`PInvoke`方法。When the example is run, it executes the `PInvoke` method. 它也會儲存為 PInvokeTest.dll 的動態組件。It also saves the dynamic assembly as PInvokeTest.dll. 您可以使用[Ildasm.exe （IL 反組譯工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)來檢查`MyType`類別和`static`(`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中)`PInvoke`它所包含的方法。You can use the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md) to examine the `MyType` class and the `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) `PInvoke` method it contains. 您可以編譯 Visual Basic 或 C# 的程式，使用靜態`MyType.GetTickCount`包含 DLL 的參考，當您執行 csc.exe 或 vbc.exe; 方法，例如`/r:PInvokeTest.dll`。You can compile a Visual Basic or C# program that uses the static `MyType.GetTickCount` method by including a reference to the DLL when you run csc.exe or vbc.exe; for example, `/r:PInvokeTest.dll`. [!code-cpp[TypeBuilder_DefinePInvokeMethod_Fix#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/TypeBuilder_DefinePInvokeMethod_Fix/cpp/100656_fix.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[TypeBuilder_DefinePInvokeMethod_Fix#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/TypeBuilder_DefinePInvokeMethod_Fix/CS/100656_fix.cs#1)] [!code-vb[TypeBuilder_DefinePInvokeMethod_Fix#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/TypeBuilder_DefinePInvokeMethod_Fix/VB/100656_fix.vb#1)]

方法，例如`/r:PInvokeTest.dll`。You can compile a Visual Basic or C# program that uses the static `MyType.GetTickCount` method by including a reference to the DLL when you run csc.exe or vbc.exe; for example, `/r:PInvokeTest.dll`. span.span: A object that represents the constructor of corresponding to , which specifies a constructor belonging to the generic type definition of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可用來取得物件，表示建構的泛型類型所代表的泛型型別定義的建構函式物件。The method provides a way to get a object that represents a constructor of a constructed generic type whose generic type definition is represented by a object. 比方說，假設您有物件，表示型別`G`C# 語法 (`G(Of T)`在 Visual Basic 中`generic ref class G`在 c + +) 和表示的建構函式物件`G`。For example, suppose you have a object that represents the type `G` in C# syntax (`G(Of T)` in Visual Basic, `generic ref class G` in C++) and a object that represents a constructor of `G`. 假設`G`具有泛型方法的型別參數`U`來建立建構類型的執行個體`G`。Suppose that `G` has a generic method with type parameter `U` that creates an instance of the constructed type `G`. 若要發出的程式碼，以建立建構類型的執行個體，您必須物件，代表這個建構函式建構的型別，也就是說，所建立的執行個體`G`。In order to emit the code to create an instance of the constructed type, you need a object that represents the constructor of this constructed type — in other words, that creates an instance of `G`. 若要這樣做，請先呼叫方法物件，指定物件，表示`U`作為類型引數。To do this, first call the method on the object, specifying the object that represents `U` as the type argument. 然後呼叫方法的傳回值方法做為參數`type`並表示的建構函式物件`G`做為參數`constructor`。Then call the method with the return value of the method as parameter `type` and the object that represents the constructor of `G` as parameter `constructor`. 傳回值是物件要發出的函式呼叫。The return value is the object you need to emit the function call. 在程式碼範例示範此案例。The code example demonstrates this scenario. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例包含名為泛用類別的原始程式碼`Sample`具有名為的型別參數`T`。The following code example contains source code for a generic class named `Sample` that has a type parameter named `T`. 類別具有名為欄位`Field`，型別的`T`，和名為泛型方法`GM`它自己的型別參數，名為`U`。The class has a field named `Field`, of type `T`, and a generic method named `GM` with its own type parameter, named `U`. 方法`GM`建立的執行個體`Sample`，以取代它自己的型別參數`U`的型別參數`Sample`，並將其輸入的參數中`Field`。Method `GM` creates an instance of `Sample`, substituting its own type parameter `U` for the type parameter of `Sample`, and stores its input parameter in `Field`. 這段原始程式碼已編譯，但未使用;您可以檢視與其[Ildasm.exe （IL 反組譯工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)以及其與類別所發出的程式碼`Example`。This source code is compiled but not used; you can view it with the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md) and compare it to the code emitted by class `Example`. 類別中的程式碼`Example`示範如何使用發出泛型的程式碼的方法。The code in class `Example` demonstrates the use of the method to emit generic code. `Main`類別的方法`Example`會建立動態組件包含類別，名為`Sample`並用方法，以使它成為泛型藉由新增名為的型別參數`T`。The `Main` method of class `Example` creates a dynamic assembly containing a class named `Sample` and uses the method to make it generic by adding a type parameter named `T`. 預設建構函式和一個名為欄位`Field`，型別的`T`，加入至類別`Sample`。A default constructor and a field named `Field`, of type `T`, are added to class `Sample`. 一種方法`GM`加入，並變成泛型的方法，使用方法。A method `GM` is added and turned into a generic method by using the method. 型別參數`GM`名為`U`。The type parameter of `GM` is named `U`. 定義型別參數之後，簽章`GM`加入使用方法。After the type parameter is defined, the signature of `GM` is added by using the method. 沒有任何傳回的型別和不必要或自訂修飾詞，這個方法讓所有的參數是`null`除了`parameterTypes`;`parameterTypes`設定方法的唯一參數的型別`U`，方法的泛型型別參數。There is no return type and no required or custom modifiers, so all the parameters of this method are `null` except `parameterTypes`; `parameterTypes` sets the type of the method's only parameter to `U`, the method's generic type parameter. 方法的主體會建立建構類型的執行個體`Sample`(`Sample(Of U)` Visual Basic 中)，將指派方法的參數`Field`，然後列印的值`Field`。The body of the method creates an instance of the constructed type `Sample` (`Sample(Of U)` in Visual Basic), assigns the method's parameter to `Field`, and then prints the value of `Field`. 方法用來建立表示建構的泛型類型的預設建構函式`Sample`在建立執行個體的指示。The method is used to create a that represents the default constructor of the constructed generic type `Sample` in the instruction that creates the instance. 空的型別定義為保留的進入點方法`Main`。A dummy type is defined to hold the entry-point method `Main`. 本文中`Main`，靜態`GM`建構的泛型型別上叫用方法`Sample`(`Sample(Of Integer)` Visual Basic 中)，與型別替代`U`。In the body of `Main`, the static `GM` method is invoked on the constructed generic type `Sample` (`Sample(Of Integer)` in Visual Basic), with type substituted for `U`. 執行程式碼範例時，它會將發出的組件儲存為 TypeBuilderGetFieldExample.exe 中。When the code example is run, it saves the emitted assembly as TypeBuilderGetFieldExample.exe. 您可以執行 TypeBuilderGetFieldExample.exe，而且您可以使用[Ildasm.exe （IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md) to compare the emitted code with the code for the `Sample` class that is compiled into the code example itself. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可用來取得物件，表示建構的泛型類型所代表的泛型型別定義的欄位物件。The method provides a way to get a object that represents a field of a constructed generic type whose generic type definition is represented by a object. 比方說，假設您有物件，表示型別`G`C# 語法 (`G(Of T)`在 Visual Basic 中`generic ref class G`在 c + +) 和物件，表示欄位`public T F`C# 語法 (`Public F As T`在 Visual Basic `public: T F` c + + 中)，由定義`G`。For example, suppose you have a object that represents the type `G` in C# syntax (`G(Of T)` in Visual Basic, `generic ref class G` in C++) and a object that represents a field `public T F` in C# syntax (`Public F As T` in Visual Basic, `public: T F` in C++) that is defined by `G`. 假設`G`具有泛型方法的型別參數`U`來建立建構類型的執行個體`G`和 [呼叫] 欄位`F`該執行個體上。Suppose that `G` has a generic method with type parameter `U` that creates an instance of the constructed type `G` and calls field `F` on that instance. 若要發出的函式呼叫，您必須物件，表示`F`建構的型別上 — 換句話說，這是型別的`U`而不是型別`T`。In order to emit the function call, you need a object that represents `F` on the constructed type — in other words, that is of type `U` rather than type `T`. 若要這樣做，請先呼叫方法物件，指定物件，表示`U`作為類型引數。To do this, first call the method on the object, specifying the object that represents `U` as the type argument. 然後呼叫方法的傳回值方法做為參數`type`並物件，表示`F`做為參數`field`。Then call the method with the return value of the method as parameter `type` and the object that represents `F` as parameter `field`. 傳回值是物件要發出的函式呼叫。The return value is the object you need to emit the function call. 在程式碼範例示範此案例。The code example demonstrates this scenario. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例包含名為範例具有名為的型別參數的泛型類別的原始程式碼`T`。The following code example contains source code for a generic class named Sample that has a type parameter named `T`. 類別具有名為欄位`Field`，型別的`T`，和名為泛型方法`GM`它自己的型別參數，名為`U`。The class has a field named `Field`, of type `T`, and a generic method named `GM` with its own type parameter, named `U`. 方法`GM`建立的執行個體`Sample`，以取代它自己的型別參數`U`的型別參數`Sample`，並將其輸入的參數中`Field`。Method `GM` creates an instance of `Sample`, substituting its own type parameter `U` for the type parameter of `Sample`, and stores its input parameter in `Field`. 這段原始程式碼已編譯，但未使用;您可以檢視與其[Ildasm.exe （IL 反組譯工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)以及其與類別所發出的程式碼`Example`。This source code is compiled but not used; you can view it with the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md) and compare it to the code emitted by class `Example`. 類別中的程式碼`Example`示範如何使用發出泛型的程式碼的方法。The code in class `Example` demonstrates the use of the method to emit generic code. `Main`類別的方法`Example`會建立動態組件包含類別，名為`Sample`，並使用方法，以使它成為泛型藉由新增名為的型別參數`T`。The `Main` method of class `Example` creates a dynamic assembly containing a class named `Sample`, and uses the method to make it generic by adding a type parameter named `T`. 預設建構函式和一個名為欄位`Field`，型別的`T`，加入至類別`Sample`。A default constructor and a field named `Field`, of type `T`, are added to class `Sample`. 一種方法`GM`加入，並變成泛型的方法，使用方法。A method `GM` is added and turned into a generic method by using the method. 型別參數`GM`名為`U`。The type parameter of `GM` is named `U`. 定義型別參數之後，簽章`GM`加入使用方法。After the type parameter is defined, the signature of `GM` is added by using the method. 沒有任何傳回的型別和不必要或自訂修飾詞，這個方法讓所有的參數是`null`除了`parameterTypes`;`parameterTypes`設定方法的唯一參數的型別`U`，方法的泛型型別參數。There is no return type and no required or custom modifiers, so all the parameters of this method are `null` except `parameterTypes`; `parameterTypes` sets the type of the method's only parameter to `U`, the method's generic type parameter. 方法的主體會建立建構類型的執行個體`Sample`(`Sample(Of U)` Visual Basic 中)，將指派方法的參數`Field`，然後列印的值`Field`。The body of the method creates an instance of the constructed type `Sample` (`Sample(Of U)` in Visual Basic), assigns the method's parameter to `Field`, and then prints the value of `Field`. 方法用來建立表示建構的泛型類型的欄位`Sample`中和指示。The method is used to create a that represents the field of the constructed generic type `Sample` in the and instructions. 空的型別定義為保留的進入點方法`Main`。A dummy type is defined to hold the entry-point method `Main`. 本文中`Main`，靜態`GM`建構的泛型型別上叫用方法`Sample`(`Sample(Of Integer)` Visual Basic 中)，與型別替代`U`。In the body of `Main`, the static `GM` method is invoked on the constructed generic type `Sample` (`Sample(Of Integer)` in Visual Basic), with type substituted for `U`. 執行程式碼範例時，它會將發出的組件儲存為 TypeBuilderGetFieldExample.exe 中。When the code example is run, it saves the emitted assembly as TypeBuilderGetFieldExample.exe. 您可以執行 TypeBuilderGetFieldExample.exe，而且您可以使用[Ildasm.exe （IL 反組譯工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)比較發出的程式碼的程式碼與`Sample`編譯成本身的程式碼範例的類別。You can run TypeBuilderGetFieldExample.exe, and you can use the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md) to compare the emitted code with the code for the `Sample` class that is compiled into the code example itself. A物件代表泛型類型定義中，如果已用來為它提供泛型類型參數的方法。A object represents a generic type definition if the method has been used to give it generic type parameters. 這個方法會擷取代表的泛型類型參數的物件。This method retrieves the objects that represent the generic type parameters. 如需有關反映和泛型反映中所使用的恆成立條件清單中的泛型類型的詳細資訊，請參閱屬性。For more information on generic types in reflection and a list of the invariant conditions for terms used in generic reflection, see the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可用來取得物件，表示建構的泛型類型所代表的泛型型別定義的方法物件。The method provides a way to get a object that represents a method of a constructed generic type whose generic type definition is represented by a object. 比方說，假設您有物件，表示型別`G`C# 語法 (`G(Of T)`在 Visual Basic 中`generic ref class G`在 c + +) 和物件，表示方法`T M()`C# 語法 (`Function M() As T`在 Visual Basic `T M()` c + + 中)，由定義`G`。For example, suppose you have a object that represents the type `G` in C# syntax (`G(Of T)` in Visual Basic, `generic ref class G` in C++) and a object that represents a method `T M()` in C# syntax (`Function M() As T` in Visual Basic, `T M()` in C++) that is defined by `G`. 假設`G`具有泛型方法的型別參數`U`來建立建構類型的執行個體`G`，並呼叫方法`M`該執行個體上。Suppose that `G` has a generic method with type parameter `U` that creates an instance of the constructed type `G` and calls method `M` on that instance. 若要發出的函式呼叫，您必須物件，表示`M`建構的型別上 — 換句話說，傳回型別`U`而不是型別`T`。In order to emit the function call, you need a object that represents `M` on the constructed type — in other words, that returns type `U` rather than type `T`. 若要這樣做，請先呼叫方法物件，指定物件，表示`U`作為類型引數。To do this, first call the method on the object, specifying the object that represents `U` as the type argument. 然後呼叫方法的傳回值方法做為參數`type`並物件，表示`T M()`做為參數`method`。Then call the method with the return value of the method as parameter `type` and the object that represents `T M()` as parameter `method`. 傳回值是物件要發出的函式呼叫。The return value is the object you need to emit the function call. 在程式碼範例示範如下所示的案例。The code example demonstrates a scenario similar to this. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例包含名為泛用類別的原始程式碼`Sample`具有名為的型別參數`T`。The following code example contains source code for a generic class named `Sample` that has a type parameter named `T`. 類別具有名為欄位`Field`，型別的`T`，和名為泛型方法`GM`它自己的型別參數，名為`U`。The class has a field named `Field`, of type `T`, and a generic method named `GM` with its own type parameter, named `U`. 方法`GM`建立的執行個體`Sample`，以取代它自己的型別參數`U`的型別參數`Sample`，並將其輸入的參數中`Field`。Method `GM` creates an instance of `Sample`, substituting its own type parameter `U` for the type parameter of `Sample`, and stores its input parameter in `Field`. 這段原始程式碼已編譯，但未使用;您可以檢視與其[Ildasm.exe （IL 反組譯工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)以及其與類別所發出的程式碼`Example`。This source code is compiled but not used; you can view it with the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md) and compare it to the code emitted by class `Example`. 類別中的程式碼`Example`示範如何使用發出泛型的程式碼的方法。The code in class `Example` demonstrates the use of the method to emit generic code. `Main`類別的方法`Example`會建立動態組件包含類別，名為`Sample`並用方法，以使它成為泛型藉由新增名為的型別參數`T`。The `Main` method of class `Example` creates a dynamic assembly containing a class named `Sample` and uses the method to make it generic by adding a type parameter named `T`. 預設建構函式和一個名為欄位`Field`，型別的`T`，加入至類別`Sample`。A default constructor and a field named `Field`, of type `T`, are added to class `Sample`. 一種方法`GM`加入，並變成泛型的方法，使用方法。A method `GM` is added and turned into a generic method by using the method. 型別參數`GM`名為`U`。The type parameter of `GM` is named `U`. 定義型別參數之後，簽章`GM`加入使用方法。After the type parameter is defined, the signature of `GM` is added by using the method. 沒有任何傳回的型別和不必要或自訂修飾詞，這個方法讓所有的參數是`null`除了`parameterTypes`;`parameterTypes`設定方法的唯一參數的型別`U`，方法的泛型型別參數。There is no return type and no required or custom modifiers, so all the parameters of this method are `null` except `parameterTypes`; `parameterTypes` sets the type of the method's only parameter to `U`, the method's generic type parameter. 方法的主體會建立建構類型的執行個體`Sample`(`Sample(Of U)` Visual Basic 中)，將指派方法的參數`Field`，然後列印的值`Field`。The body of the method creates an instance of the constructed type `Sample` (`Sample(Of U)` in Visual Basic), assigns the method's parameter to `Field`, and then prints the value of `Field`. 空的型別定義為保留的進入點方法`Main`。A dummy type is defined to hold the entry-point method `Main`. 本文中`Main`，靜態`GM`建構的泛型型別上叫用方法`Sample`(`Sample(Of Integer)` Visual Basic 中)，與型別替代`U`。In the body of `Main`, the static `GM` method is invoked on the constructed generic type `Sample` (`Sample(Of Integer)` in Visual Basic), with type substituted for `U`. 方法用來建立靜態`GM`方法建構的泛型型別`Sample`，而方法可用來建立，可以發出方法呼叫中。The method is used to create a for the static `GM` method of the constructed generic type `Sample`, and the method is then used to create a that can emitted in a method call. 執行程式碼範例時，它會將發出的組件儲存為 TypeBuilderGetFieldExample.exe 中。When the code example is run, it saves the emitted assembly as TypeBuilderGetFieldExample.exe. 您可以執行 TypeBuilderGetFieldExample.exe，而且您可以使用[Ildasm.exe （IL 反組譯工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)比較發出的程式碼的程式碼與`Sample`編譯成本身的程式碼範例的類別。You can run TypeBuilderGetFieldExample.exe, and you can use the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md) to compare the emitted code with the code for the `Sample` class that is compiled into the code example itself. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果方法宣告中的參數數目等於在指定的引數清單中，引數的數目和每個引數的型別可轉換為參數的型別繫結器，便會叫用方法。A method will be invoked if the number of parameters in the method declaration equals the number of arguments in the specified argument list, and the type of each argument can be converted by the binder to the type of the parameter. 繫結器將會尋找所有相符的方法。The binder will find all of the matching methods. 這些方法可以找到根據繫結要求 （BindingFlags.InvokeMethod BindingFlags.GetProperties，等等。） 的類型。These methods are found based on the type of binding requested (BindingFlags.InvokeMethod, BindingFlags.GetProperties, and so on.). 一組方法會依名稱、 目的引數，以及一組繫結器中所定義的搜尋修飾詞進行篩選。The set of methods is filtered by the name, number of arguments, and a set of search modifiers defined in the binder. 方法選取之後，就會叫用。After the method is selected, it will be invoked. 協助工具會在該點檢查。Accessibility is checked at that point. 搜尋可以控制哪一組方法會搜尋根據與方法關聯的協助工具屬性。The search can control which set of methods are searched based upon the accessibility attribute associated with the method. `IBinder.BindToMethod`方法會負責選取要叫用方法。The `IBinder.BindToMethod` method is responsible for selecting the method to be invoked. 預設繫結器會選取最特定的相符項目。The default binder selects the most specific match. > [!NOTE] > 完全信任程式碼會略過存取限制。Access restrictions are ignored for fully trusted code. 也就是說，私用建構函式、 方法、 欄位和屬性可存取，而且完全受信任的程式碼時，使用反映來叫用。That is, private constructors, methods, fields, and properties can be accessed and invoked using Reflection whenever the code is fully trusted. 目前不支援這個方法。This method is not currently supported. 您可以使用類型來擷取或和擷取的型別上使用反映。You can retrieve the type using or and use reflection on the retrieved type.

exception.span: 這個方法目前不支援不完整的類型。

span.span: This method is not currently supported for incomplete types.

.property instance bool IsSecurityCritical
Public Overrides ReadOnly Property IsSecurityCritical As Boolean

summary.span: 取得值，這個值表示目前類型是否為安全性關鍵或安全性安全關鍵，因而可以執行重要的作業。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the current type is security-critical or security-safe-critical, and therefore can perform critical operations.

value.span: 如果目前型別為安全性關鍵或安全性安全關鍵，則為 ，如果它是透明，則為 。

span.span: if the current type is security-critical or security-safe-critical; if it is transparent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ， ，和屬性報表透明度層級的型別，由 common language runtime (CLR) 所決定。The , , and properties report the transparency level of the type, as determined by the common language runtime (CLR). 下表顯示這些屬性的組合：The combinations of these properties are shown in the following table: |安全性層級Security level|IsSecurityCriticalIsSecurityCritical|IsSecuritySafeCriticalIsSecuritySafeCritical|IsSecurityTransparentIsSecurityTransparent| |--------------------|------------------------|----------------------------|---------------------------| |CriticalCritical|`true`|`false`|`false`| |安全關鍵Safe-critical|`true`|`true`|`false`| |透明Transparent|`false`|`false`|`true`| 使用這些屬性會比檢查組件及其類型的安全性註釋、檢查目前的信任層級，以及嘗試複製執行階段規則更簡單。Using these properties is much simpler than examining the security annotations of an assembly and its types, checking the current trust level, and attempting to duplicate the runtime's rules. 在執行階段開始評估透明度層級，在組件。The runtime begins evaluating transparency levels at the assembly. 比方說，如果安全性關鍵的動態組件，類型上的註釋會被忽略，和所有類型都是安全性關鍵。For example, if the dynamic assembly is security-critical, annotations on types are ignored, and all types are security-critical. 根據預設，動態組件會繼承它發出的組件的透明度。By default, a dynamic assembly inherits the transparency of the assembly that emits it. 您可以使用覆寫此預設值， ，或方法多載，並指定安全性屬性。You can override this default by using the , , or method overload and specifying security attributes. 您無法這樣做; 提升的安全性層級也就是透明的程式碼無法發出安全性關鍵或安全性安全關鍵程式碼。You cannot elevate security levels by doing this; that is, transparent code cannot emit security-critical or security-safe-critical code. 建立動態組件，或它們才會生效之前已儲存至磁碟並重新載入組件時，必須指定屬性。Attributes must be specified when the dynamic assembly is created, or they do not take effect until the assembly has been saved to disk and reloaded. > [!NOTE] > 預設值繼承僅限於透明化的執行階段的評估。Default inheritance is limited to the runtime's evaluation of transparency. 沒有屬性會套用至動態組件。No attributes are applied to the dynamic assembly. 如果您想要新增安全性屬性，您必須套用它們自己。If you want to add security attributes, you must apply them yourself. 如需有關反映發出和透明度，請參閱[反映發出中的安全性問題](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-issues-in-reflection-emit.md)。For more information about reflection emit and transparency, see [Security Issues in Reflection Emit](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-issues-in-reflection-emit.md). 投影片的相關資訊，請參閱[安全性變更](~/docs/framework/security/security-changes.md)。For information about transparency, see [Security Changes](~/docs/framework/security/security-changes.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks ， ，和屬性報表透明度層級的型別，由 common language runtime (CLR) 所決定。The , , and properties report the transparency level of the type, as determined by the common language runtime (CLR). 下表顯示這些屬性的組合：The combinations of these properties are shown in the following table: |安全性層級Security level|IsSecurityCriticalIsSecurityCritical|IsSecuritySafeCriticalIsSecuritySafeCritical|IsSecurityTransparentIsSecurityTransparent| |--------------------|------------------------|----------------------------|---------------------------| |CriticalCritical|`true`|`false`|`false`| |安全關鍵Safe-critical|`true`|`true`|`false`| |透明Transparent|`false`|`false`|`true`| 使用這些屬性會比檢查組件及其類型的安全性註釋、檢查目前的信任層級，以及嘗試複製執行階段規則更簡單。Using these properties is much simpler than examining the security annotations of an assembly and its types, checking the current trust level, and attempting to duplicate the runtime's rules. 在執行階段開始評估透明度層級，在組件。The runtime begins evaluating transparency levels at the assembly. 比方說，如果安全性關鍵的動態組件，類型上的註釋會被忽略，和所有類型都是安全性關鍵。For example, if the dynamic assembly is security-critical, annotations on types are ignored, and all types are security-critical. 根據預設，動態組件會繼承它發出的組件的透明度。By default, a dynamic assembly inherits the transparency of the assembly that emits it. 您可以使用覆寫此預設值， ，或方法多載，並指定安全性屬性。You can override this default by using the , , or method overload and specifying security attributes. 您無法這樣做; 提升的安全性層級也就是透明的程式碼無法發出安全性關鍵或安全性安全關鍵程式碼。You cannot elevate security levels by doing this; that is, transparent code cannot emit security-critical or security-safe-critical code. 建立動態組件，或它們才會生效之前已儲存至磁碟並重新載入組件時，必須指定屬性。Attributes must be specified when the dynamic assembly is created, or they do not take effect until the assembly has been saved to disk and reloaded. > [!NOTE] > 預設值繼承僅限於透明化的執行階段的評估。Default inheritance is limited to the runtime's evaluation of transparency. 沒有屬性會套用至動態組件。No attributes are applied to the dynamic assembly. 如果您想要新增安全性屬性，您必須套用它們自己。If you want to add security attributes, you must apply them yourself. 如需有關反映發出和透明度，請參閱[反映發出中的安全性問題](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-issues-in-reflection-emit.md)。For more information about reflection emit and transparency, see [Security Issues in Reflection Emit](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-issues-in-reflection-emit.md). 投影片的相關資訊，請參閱[安全性變更](~/docs/framework/security/security-changes.md)。For information about transparency, see [Security Changes](~/docs/framework/security/security-changes.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可用來產生任何可能的項目型別，包括泛型類型的陣列類型。The method provides a way to generate an array type with any possible element type, including generic types. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立動態模組，名為抽象型別`Sample`，和名為抽象方法`TestMethod`。The following code example creates a dynamic module, an abstract type named `Sample`, and an abstract method named `TestMethod`. `TestMethod` 會採用`ref`參數 (`ByRef` Visual Basic 中) 的型別`Sample`，類型的指標`Sample`，和類型的陣列`Sample`。`TestMethod` takes a `ref` parameter (`ByRef` in Visual Basic) of type `Sample`, a pointer to type `Sample`, and an array of type `Sample`. 它會傳回類型的二維陣列`Sample`。It returns a two-dimensional array of type `Sample`. 在程式碼範例會儲存至磁碟，動態模組讓您可以檢查它與[Ildasm.exe （IL 反組譯工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)。The code example saves the dynamic module to disk, so you can examine it with the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可用來產生`ref`型別 (`ByRef` Visual Basic 中) 的參數清單。The method provides a way to generate `ref` types (`ByRef` in Visual Basic) for parameter lists. > [!NOTE] > 使用 Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) 語法中，如果目前代表`MyType`，則這個方法所傳回的型別會是`MyType&`。Using Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) syntax, if the current represents `MyType`, then the type returned by this method would be `MyType&`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立動態模組，名為抽象型別`Sample`，和名為抽象方法`TestMethod`。The following code example creates a dynamic module, an abstract type named `Sample`, and an abstract method named `TestMethod`. `TestMethod` 會採用`ref`參數 (`ByRef` Visual Basic 中) 的型別`Sample`，類型的指標`Sample`，和類型的陣列`Sample`。`TestMethod` takes a `ref` parameter (`ByRef` in Visual Basic) of type `Sample`, a pointer to type `Sample`, and an array of type `Sample`. 它會傳回類型的二維陣列`Sample`。It returns a two-dimensional array of type `Sample`. 在程式碼範例會儲存至磁碟，動態模組讓您可以檢查它與[Ildasm.exe （IL 反組譯工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)。The code example saves the dynamic module to disk, so you can examine it with the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您發出的程式碼需要從目前的泛型類型定義建構的類型時，請使用這個方法。Use this method when your emitted code requires a type constructed from the current generic type definition. 您不需要呼叫方法之前呼叫方法表示泛型類型定義。It is not necessary to call the method before calling the method on a that represents a generic type definition. 如果目前不代表泛型類型，定義就會擲回。If the current does not represent the definition of a generic type, an is thrown. 此方法的函式所傳回作為中發出的程式碼建構的泛型類型的預留位置的物件。The object returned by this method functions as a placeholder for a constructed generic type in your emitted code. 它是衍生自類別的執行個體，其功能有限。It is an instance of a class derived from that has limited capabilities. 特別之處在於：In particular: - 若要取得這些建構的泛型類型的方法、 欄位和建構函式，使用， ，和方法多載。To get methods, fields, and constructors for these constructed generic types, use the , , and method overloads. - 兩個代表相同的建構的類型的執行個體不會比較為相等。Two instances that represent the same constructed type do not compare as equal. 例如，在下列程式碼`t1.Equals(t2)`傳回`false`:For example, in the following code `t1.Equals(t2)` returns `false`: [!code-cpp[System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.MakeGenericType#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.reflection.emit.typebuilder.makegenerictype/cpp/remarks.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.MakeGenericType#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.reflection.emit.typebuilder.makegenerictype/cs/remarks.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.MakeGenericType#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.reflection.emit.typebuilder.makegenerictype/vb/remarks.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`parent`已`null`，做為基底類型。If `parent` is `null`, is used as the base type. 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，不會擲回例外狀況`parent`為介面類型，但時擲回呼叫方法。In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, no exception is thrown if `parent` is an interface type, but a is thrown when the method is called. 方法不會檢查大部分的無效的父類型。The method does not check for most invalid parent types. 比方說，不會拒絕具有沒有預設建構函式，當目前的類型都有預設建構函式時，它不會拒絕密封的類型，而不會拒絕的父類型型別。For example, it does not reject a parent type that has no default constructor when the current type has a default constructor, it does not reject sealed types, and it does not reject the type. 在這些情況下，會擲回例外狀況方法。In all these cases, exceptions are thrown by the method.
